price: Dájúdájú Allāhu l’Ó ń mú kóró èso irúgbìn àti kóró èso dàbínù hù jáde. Ó ń mú alààyè jáde láti ara òkú. Ó sì ń mú òkú jáde láti ara alààyè. Ìyẹn ni Allāhu. Nítorí náà, báwo ni wọ́n ṣe ń ṣẹ yín lórí kúrò níbi òdodo?
arabic: ۞ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ فَالِقُ ٱلۡحَبِّ وَٱلنَّوَىٰۖ يُخۡرِجُ ٱلۡحَيَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمَيِّتِ وَمُخۡرِجُ ٱلۡمَيِّتِ مِنَ ٱلۡحَيِّۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤۡفَكُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha fāliqu al-ḥabi wal-nawā yukh'riju al-ḥaya mina al-mayiti wamukh'riju al-mayiti mina al-ḥayi dhālikumu al-lahu fa-annā tu'fakūna
